Subject: VA will not install backend updates
Description:
Hi Support,

I have checked our virtual appliance today and found there are some backend updates available for it. However i have been unable to install them even after several attempts. I have checked what i can including that the machine has sufficient space and internet access and everything looks ok. Is there any log we can look at to see why the updates will not install please?

Kind Regards,
Andrew
What_We_Know__c: Backend updates can not be applied from the UI
Next_Steps__c: I asked for a remote session in order to apply the backend updates from the server's backend
Solution_Comment__c: The backend updates were all applied from the server's backend during the remote session
